subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Annika Sorenstam made up five strokes on the leader Angela Stanford in the Lorena Ochoa Invitational in Guadalajara, Mexico, shooting a five-under-par 67 to cut her deficit to one stroke entering the final round. Ochoa, the tournament host, celebrated her 27th birthday with her best round of the week, a 70 that left her eight strokes back.
